name: WoPo File Converter
author: WoPo Web

sections.description:
WoPo File Converter is an online file converter that supports nearly all audio, video, document, ebook, archive, image, spreadsheet, and presentation formats.

You can add the shortcode [wopo-file-converter] to the page where you want to display the converter form. To get started, use the form button and select files to convert from your computer.

WoPo File Converter Pro

  1. Unlimited files converted
  2. Convert your files via your self-hosting
  3. Premium Converter Form Style
  4. Input file extensions (e.g., enter ‘.pdf’ for the user to only be able to upload PDFs). ** NEW **

Demo Online: https://wopofileconverter.xyz/

Buy it now: https://wopoweb.com/product/wopo-file-converter-pro/

Icons made by photo3idea_studio from www.flaticon.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wopo-file-converter directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Add shortcode [wopo-file-converter] to page you want to show app windows
sections.faq:
Are you using any third party APIs?

YES, we are using CloudConvert APIs. Our plugin get list file extension and convert engine data from CloudConvert API. You can read more about CloudConvert API on link below:
* CloudConvert API document: https://cloudconvert.com/api/v2
* CloudConvert API Terms of Use: https://cloudconvert.com/terms

I have a suggestion for the plugin. How should I contact you?

We are always looking for feedback from you. Whether itâ€™s a completely new plugin or adding some custom functionality to any existing plugin, we are always ready to do that. You can contact us at wopoweb@gmail.com
sections.changelog:
1.2.0 (December 28, 2023)

  • Added option for Pro version Style 2

1.1.0 (November 29, 2023)

  • Added option for input file extensions in the Pro version. Requires PHP: >= 8.1.0

1.0.2

  • Added form class for Style 1

1.0.1

  • Compatibility with WoPo File Converter Pro version

1.0

  • Initial release
